result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

11:00 AM Defendant Amanda M Kitchen in court.  Attorney Dan Firkus appeared by video for Amanda M Kitchen.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Firkus waives further reading.
NG plea entered. 
JT 12/20/22

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must have no contact with D.S.

07/20/2022 AMENDED: COURT AMEND BOND TO CHANGE THE NO CONTACT WITH D.S. TO MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH D.K. ALL OTHER CONDITIONS REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

09/08/2022 AMENDED:  COURT AMENDS BOND TO CHANGE THE NO CONTACT WITH D.K. TO MUST HAVE NO ABUSIVE CONTACT WITH D.K..  ALL OTHER CONDITIONS REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

8:14 AM Defendant Amanda M Kitchen in court.  Attorney Brian H. Wright in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Dan Firkus appeared by video for Amanda M Kitchen. Attorney Firkus moves to modify bond form no contact with victim to no abusive contact with victim.  Court grants modification.  Bond t reflect "Must have no abusive contact with Daniel Kitchen. All other conditions of this bond remain in full force and effect."
Motion hearing on September 8, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Defendants Motion to Modify Bond

8:17 AM  Defendant Amanda M Kitchen appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Dan Firkus appeared by video for Amanda M Kitchen. Officer Rylee Roen with RLPD appears by Zoom video.  8:18 a.m. Officer called and sworn.  Direct by State.  8:22 a.m. Cross by Attorney Firkus.  8:23 a.m. Redirect by State.  Court relates, finds probable cause on Counts 1 and 2, and binds over for trial.   Arraignment set and if Defendant is released from jail she must appear in person.

SCANNED TO BARRON COUNTY JAIL
Arraignment scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Attorney fees.  Attorney Dan Firkus appointed.  Repay $50.00 per month starting 08/20/22.
Attorney Firkus to be repaid at the rate of $50.00/month.
Preliminary hearing on July 22, 2022 at 08:15 am.; sent to Defendant at BC Jail on 7/21/22

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473. 

Must have no contact with D.S.

1:00 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Amanda M Kitchen appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Andrew T Knaak appeared by video for Amanda M Kitchen for today only.  Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney.  Address and phone number confirmed.   AIA set and must appear in person.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
